Trade/Device Name(s): AncestryDNA Factor V Leiden Genetic Health Risk Test
Analyte(s): Factor V Leiden c.1601G>A variant in the F5 gene
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AncestryDNA Factor V Leiden Genetic Health Risk Test for qualitative genotyping of the Factor V Leiden variant in human saliva using multiplex assay and Illumina platform
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative genotyping test to detect clinically relevant Factor V Leiden variant in genomic DNA from saliva of adults 18+ years using AncestryDNA Saliva Collection Kit, reporting genetic health risks for hereditary thrombophilia; not for diagnosis or medical decision-making
